name: Ambrella
detail: Ambrella (Kabushiki-Gaisha Amuburera (Japanese: 株式会社アムブレラ)) is a Japanese video game development company that works under a publishing agreement with Nintendo best known for making spin-off games for the Pokémon video game franchise. Ambrella was formerly a part of Marigul Management.
